title: Team Settings - Renders App Icon Selection - Auto
App Icon - Renders app icon customization with no favorite teams set - Auto
custom_preconds: - User has no favorite teams selected
custom_steps:
- Open the app 
- Open more menu -> Account -> Set Home Screen Icon
custom_expected: Teams are listed by division and "My Teams" is not displayed

title: App Icon - Renders app icon customization with favorite teams set - Auto
custom_preconds: User has Giants and Mets set as favorite teams
custom_steps:
- Open the app
- Open More -> Account -> Set Home Screen Icon
custom_expected: A section for "MY TEAMS" is displayed containing "San Francisco Giants" and "New York Mets"  The rest of the teams are all listed grouped by division omitting the teams defined in "MY TEAMS".

title: App Icon - App icon can be changed - Auto
custom_steps:
- Open the app
- Open More -> Account -> Set Home Screen Icon
- Tap on Chicago white Sox
- Observe that alert is shown notifying of icon change
- Tap on "Ok" in the alert
- Observe that title and icon reflect change
- Tap on "Reset to MLB"
- Observe that alert is shown notifying of icon change
- Tap on "Ok" in the alert
- Observe that title and icon reflect change
custom_expected: Icon should be switched to White sox then back to the default
